attributes.action: Reinstate David Nutt to his position as the UKs chief drug advisor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please reinstate David Nutt to his previous position as cheif drugs advisor as the government does not have legitimate grounds for firing him. He has merely spoken the truth on the governments drug policies and explained how the government ingores the advice of research professionals if they do not back government opinion. 

There has been no increase in mental health issues in the last 10 years and research has shown alcohol to be more dangerous.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
